item.title: The interaction of the Lifesum app was nice, so I tried to recreate it.
item.description: #Swift4.2 I tried to recreate the interaction of the registration guide of the app Lifesum because it was very nice. I'm curious about the correlation between the awesomeness of the interaction and the registration dropout rate.

item.title: Docker image that can be SSHed in(Ubuntu14.04)
item.description: For Ansible practice, I wrote this because I wanted an image that can be entered by SSH. Click here for CentOS7 Click here for CentOS6

item.title: Docker image that can be SSHed in(CentOS7)
item.description: For Ansible practice, I wrote this because I wanted an image that can be entered by SSH. docker build -t ssh_centos7:latest . --no-cache docker run -d -p 2222:22 ssh_centos7:latest ssh-keygen -R [localhost]:2222 ssh -p 2222 kabigon@localhost (adsbygoogle = window.

item.title: Obtaining JSON from the API using Alamofire(Swift4.2)
item.description: Old article (Swift3) is here Getting JSON from the API using Alamofire #Xcode 10.1 #Swift 4.2 This is a sample to get information from the weather API using Alamofire, a famous swift communication library, and SwiftyJSON, a famous swift JSON library.
